title: Barefoot Luxury with Raffles in the Dreamy Seychelles
description: Holiday destinations don’t get much dreamier than this. Escape to the Indian Ocean paradise of the Seychelles, where azure waters dotted with colourful coral lap postcard-perfect, palm-fringed white sands. Treat yourself to the getaway of a lifetime staying in world-renowned luxury at Raffles Seychelles, a beachfront all-villa oasis on the island of Praslin, known as the ‘Garden of Eden’ for its exquisite beauty. Stay in a luxurious private pool villa with daily breakfast, indulgent nightly dinner, private return airport transfers, a 'Praslin Sling' cocktail each and savings on spa treatments.
offer_address: Anse Takamaka Baie Sainte Anne praslin, Seychelles
